typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PartsuppDSV
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PartsuppDSV2
PartsuppDSV derive(supplycost = replace(PS_SUPPLYCOST, ',', '.')) ~> CommaToDot
PartsuppDSV2 derive(supplycost = replace(PS_SUPPLYCOST, ',', '.')) ~> CommaToDot2
CommaToDot sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partsupp_cleaned_1.dsv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PartsuppCleaned1
CommaToDot2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PartsuppCleaned2
